567712.title: The Kiss
567712.plot: Two women shake hands and kiss. The first ever moving image of a kiss was not filmed, but instead consists of individual photographs shot by Eadweard Muybridge in rapid succession, making a moving picture when using Muybridge's zoopraxiscope.

862594.title: The 1882 Transit of Venus
862594.plot: Telescopic chronophotography of the 1882 transit of Venus as observed from Lick Observatory.
